title: High ping in EUNE
body: I got 160ms ping for 3 days it doesnt change? What may be the reasons? Usually it is 45ms

replies.body:
I followed your instructions. No packet lost I did also release/renew ipconfig and downloaded and ran hextech repair tool. Now I have 35ms, like never before! Thank you so much Porocles! 
Btw what do you think were the reasons of my high ping?

Is there somebody else, who could reply for this question?
EUW server is okey. 30-40 ms. Its really good, BUT
EUNE server isn't. Avarage 200-2000ms. And everywhere i have got 14-30 ms usually. 

250mbps lan connection.

It sounds like you could be having a network issue keeping a steady connection to the game server, and it could happen for various reasons or how your ISP is routing to us.  As a first step, go over the instructions in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot.  Let me know if you still have any issues afterwards!
